name: Hello World
description: Simple hello world application. Requires 1 container.

name: Neflix OSS
description: Collection of core Netflix OSS components for getting started with development of a microservices application. Requires 5 containers.

name: OpenDaylight Lithium SR2
description: Lithium is the third release of OpenDaylight, the open source platform for building programmable, software-defined networks. With Lithium, service providers and enterprises can transition to SDN with particular focus on broadening the programmability of intelligent networks.

name: Docker Registry (local storage)
description: Docker Registry v2 with local storage

name: Zookeeper 3.4.6
description: Zookeeper multi-node cluster. Requires 3 containers & 3 hosts.

name: Kafka 0.8.2.1
description: Apache Kafka is publish-subscribe messaging rethought as a distributed commit log. This blueprint also includes Zookeeper 3.4.6. Requires 3 containers & 3 hosts.

name: MongoDB 2.6
description: MongoDB is a cross-platform document-oriented database. Requires 3 containers & 3 hosts.

name: OpenStack - Icehouse
description: Core OpenStack services running in Docker containers. For more details, see https://github.com/Nirmata/openstack

name: Liferay 7.0
description: Popular open source enterprise web platform for content management and collaboration. Requires 2 containers. For more details, see https://github.com/NirmataOSS/liferay
